item.title: Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle
item.description:
Title: Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle
Genre: Action , Adventure , Free To Play
Developer: Bungie
Publisher: Bungie
Franchise: Destiny
Release Date: Feb 4, 2025




About This Content

Purchase the Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle and receive the Spinning Seat Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Heresy, cosmetics, and more!

Visit the Eververse store in-game to use your Silver and buy Destiny 2: Heresy.

To unlock your new Legendary emote, visit the Special Deliveries Terminal in the Tower.

One-time purchase only available during Destiny: Heresy. Silver is an in-game currency used at the Eververse store.

Destiny 2: Heresy not included with purchase.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 3250 3.5 GHz or Intel Pentium G4560 3.5 GHz / AMD FX-4350 4.2 GHz
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 2GB or GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 105 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Beginning on June 4, 2024, Destiny 2 is ending support for Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 8.1 operating systems.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
    • Processor: Processor Intel® Core™ i5 2400 3.4 GHz or i5 7400 3.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen R5 1600X 3.6 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 4GB or GTX 1060 6GB / AMD R9 390 8GB Memory 8 GB RAM
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 105 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Beginning on June 4, 2024, Destiny 2 is ending support for Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 8.1 operating systems.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
item.description:
Title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Warhorse Studios
Publisher: Deep Silver
Franchise: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
Release Date: Feb 4, 2025




About This Game

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game contains frequent depictions of violence, killing, brutality and blood. Furthermore coarse language and crude humor is used in an extensive manner. The player will further come across adult themes, alcohol as well as sexual activity and nudity.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (or newer)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 2600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), AMD Radeon RX 580
    • Storage: 100 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (or newer)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700K, AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
    • Memory: 32 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070, AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT
    • Storage: 100 GB available space

item.title: Blood Bar Tycoon
item.description:
Title: Blood Bar Tycoon
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Clever Trickster Studio
Publisher: Clever Trickster Productions
Franchise: Top Indie Developers
Release Date: Feb 4, 2025




About This Game

Revamp your vampire bar!

As a vampire bar manager, transform shabby bistros into the trendiest bars in the neighborhood! At the same time, lure those clueless mortals into your quirky blood factory to feed other vampires. Manage stocks, avoid bankruptcy, and prevent hunters from burning down your blood bars.



Hire low-level vampires as minions to carry out your dirty work. Manage their priorities to optimize your operations and satisfy both your mortal and immortal customers. Don’t forget to feed them as well!

Arrange the hallways, rooms, and other amenities to your taste to enhance the prestige of your bar and become a true neighborhood hotspot.

Capture juicy humans!

Develop an underground detention center for humans before processing them in your wacky machines to extract their precious blood in all its forms.



What’s better than serving bloody slushies or a bloody daiquiri to satisfy your wealthiest and most demanding vampire clients? Discover crazy cocktails with new ways to harvest and process blood!

If everything goes right, the humans will leave your establishment with a free hangover. But if there’s trouble, you’ll have a corpse on your hands... and you risk attracting the attention of vampire hunters!

Unleash your vampiric creativity!

You’re not just a vampire bar manager; you’re the architect of a true nocturnal masterpiece. Enjoy extensive freedom to renovate, design, and customize every aspect of your establishment with a wide range of themes and styles.

Transform rundown taverns into spectacular bars where every detail, from furniture to lighting, reflects your unique vision. Create the perfect ambiance to attract the most discerning vampires and become a legend of the night! Competitions will highlight the most stunning bars!

Micromanage or automate your minions! The choice is yours!

Take command of your minions with micro-interactions, managing them like a true vampire overlord to tackle emergencies. Seamlessly blend micromanagement with automation, assign work sectors, and set priorities to grow your dark empire like an evil mastermind!

Handle the whims of Elder vampires

Interact with enigmatic Elder vampires who will guide you through the night and shape your destiny as a blood bar manager. But beware, each Elder has a unique personality. Please them, and you’ll be handsomely rewarded! Disappoint them, and you’ll face their wrath as they plot your downfall.

Expand through Crimson City!

Your first blood bar marks the beginning of your ascent to dominate the blood trade in Crimson City! Each new bar presents new challenges to overcome at your own pace.

Prevent your impatient and voracious customers from feeding directly on your human clients. Improve your facilities, machines, and staff. Utilize research and new systems to earn riches more quickly!

Analyze your numbers to become the best vampire bar manager in the city.

Your ultimate goal: becoming an Elder!


Try to please the Elders to gain their favor or suffer their wrath! Understand their personalities and learn how to flatter them. Will you ally with the crazy Yumeko, the voluptuous Sophie, the megalomaniac Vladimir, or someone else? Take control of every district in Crimson City with their help to become one of them and rule for eternity!

Will you achieve your vampiric goals or fail miserably?





Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-1135G7 or AMD Ryzen 5 5500U
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030, 2GB (Legacy: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460), AMD RX550, 2GB (Legacy: AMD Radeon HD 6850), Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 630
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-11370H or AMD Ryzen 7 5800H
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 5 GB available space

item.title: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To
item.description:
Title: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To
Genre: Casual , Indie
Developer: Soft Not Weak, LLC
Publisher: Soft Not Weak, LLC
Release Date: Feb 3, 2025




About This Game


Samar is a young witch who works the spirit-swapping night shift in the eastern outskirts of Demashq. A recent spike in spirits crossing over from another dimension within the borders of the city has them puzzling over what’s going on.

With friends needing help - and a popular band scheduled to kick off their big comeback tour in Demashq - Samar needs to work quickly before the city is overrun with stans and spirits alike!

Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To blends two major sources of inspiration: the joyful, colorful puzzle mechanics of Panel de Pon and the heartfelt and playful storytelling of visual novels/dating sims.

  • Swap to a custom lofi soundtrack by the incredible Meltycanon.

  • Cast powerful spells by arranging spirits into special patterns to unlock potent powers.

  • Bond with a diverse cast of witches and demons … and maybe even smooch.

  • Decorate your bedroom. Earn trinkets and keepsakes as you play, then place them to decorate Samar’s room.

  • Enjoy unique game modes , including Endless and local Versus!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

item.title: The Sims™ 25th Birthday Bundle
item.description:
Informații despre dezvoltator indisponibile.



About the Game

The games you know and love. For Windows 10/11.

In The Sims, create an entire neighborhood of Sims and run or ruin their lives. Help them pursue careers, make friends, and find romance — or watch the chaos unfold as you explore different choices. Open-ended gameplay gives you the freedom to set your own goals and chart your Sims’ destinies. It is your neighborhood, and they are your Sims. Whether they prosper or perish is completely up to you.

In The Sims 2, you direct your Sims over a lifetime and guide their characteristics from one generation to the next. You set your Sims' goals in life: popularity, fortune, family, romance, or knowledge. Give them a long, successful existence or leave their lives in shambles. Take them to extremes — from marrying an alien to writing a great novel or even seeing a ghost. Unleash your creativity with Create-A-Sim, building options, and the in-game movie camera. Get ready to guide their characteristics, fulfill their dreams, and push them to extremes. What do you want to do with your Sims' lives?

The Sims 25th Birthday Bundle includes:

  • The Sims
  • The Sims 2
  • The Sims 4 Throwback Fit Kit
  • The Sims 4 Grunge Revival Kit

The Sims 25th Birthday also includes the following The Sims packs:
  • The Sims Livin’ Large
  • The Sims House Party
  • The Sims Hot Date
  • The Sims Vacation
  • The Sims Unleashed
  • The Sims Superstar
  • The Sims Makin’ Magic

The Sims 25th Birthday Bundle also includes the following The Sims 2 packs:
  • The Sims 2 University
  • The Sims 2 Nightlife
  • The Sims 2 Open for Business
  • The Sims 2 Pets
  • The Sims 2 Bon Voyage
  • The Sims 2 Seasons
  • The Sims 2 FreeTime
  • The Sims 2 Apartment Life
  • The Sims 2 Holiday Party Pack
  • The Sims 2 Family Fun Stuff
  • The Sims 2 Glamour Life Stuff
  • The Sims 2 Happy Holiday Stuff
  • The Sims 2 Celebration! Stuff
  • The Sims 2 H&M Fashion Stuff
  • The Sims 2 Teen Style Stuff
  • The Sims 2 Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff
  • The Sims 2 Mansion & Garden Stuff
